query:
ALTER TABLE cost_records 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quantityProduced DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unit VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'kg',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS directCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS directCostDetails JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS indirectCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS indirectCostDetails JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS laborCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS laborCostDetails JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS destinationId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightCost DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxCost DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS otherVariableCosts DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS otherVariableCostsDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS wastagePercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS wastageValue DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalCost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unitCost DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sellingPrice DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS grossMargin DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS grossMarginPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'rascunho',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS observations TEXT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3uYwUxtivMj8soi.e2c3e95bc24b --database aAFi3UvfwvVXettMY36Wvq --execute ALTER TABLE cost_records 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS quantityProduced DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unit VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'kg',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS directCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS directCostDetails JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS indirectCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS indirectCostDetails JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS laborCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS laborCostDetails JSON,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS destinationId INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightCost DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxCost DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS otherVariableCosts DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS otherVariableCostsDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS wastagePercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS wastageValue DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS totalCost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS unitCost DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS sellingPrice DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS grossMargin DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS grossMarginPercent DECIMAL(5,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'rascunho',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS observations TEXT;
